name: Big Money!
summary: Cash in on this excellent puzzle game. Collect groups of 3 or more matching coins... fill up the money meter... grab money bags and advance to the next level. It's sure to keep your interest!
info:
• 发行: PopCap Games
  • 别名: Big Money! Deluxe
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: PUZ
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2003年4月1日
